Bellevue.Joint Institute for the Study of the Atm: The Joint Institute for the Study of the Atmosphere and Ocean (JISAO) has existed since 1977 for the purpose of fostering research collaboration between National Oceanic and Atmospheric Administration (NOAA) Office of Oceanic and Atmospheric Research (OAR) and the University of Washington (UW). Dr. Thomas Ackerman, a Battelle Fellow, is the current director.
